ingredients.ingredient: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle caffeinated citrus-flavored soda (such as Mountain Dew®)
4 small Granny Smith apple, peeled, cored, and quartered
2 (8 ounce) packages refrigerated crescent roll dough

cookingTips: Melt butter with sugar and cinnamon to create sweet sauce, then pour into baking dish
Wrap each apple quarter in crescent roll dough, then arrange in baking dish over sauce
Pour soda around dumplings and bake at 350°F for 40-50 minutes until golden and apples are tender
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How should I wrap the apples and what role does the soda play in cooking?
